channel.title: Able to carry a glock over from the apprehension weapons-strip
channel.description:
It's a minor issue (not game breaking), but I got curious and decided to take one of the assassin's glocks with me after the fight at the end of apprehension. Let the scene play out, and this happened (no I didn't manually spawn it):
[img]https://i.imgur.com/usVdchZ.jpg[/img]
That said, it's a minor issue. I'm honestly surprised this was overlooked.
Edit: Map name's bm_c2a3c

item.title: Able to carry a glock over from the apprehension weapons-strip
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
Yeah. After you’ve killed the assassins, open the gate per usual then grab one of the glocks on the ground, and run into the wall (and face it). You’ll pick it up when you get knocked out by the grunts.

Read full topic
item.source: Able to carry a glock over from the apprehension weapons-strip

item.title: Able to carry a glock over from the apprehension weapons-strip
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
You mean you picked it up like a physprop and carried it ahead?

Read full topic
